sent.orig: And finally, strawberry; the strawberry was always supposed to taste, but never knew how.
sent.trans: 每种味道一一呈现的过程，就想书中的一个个章节。

sent.orig: As in strawberry? You want strawberry ice cream?
sent.trans: “像是草莓吗？你要草莓口味的冰淇淋？”我问。

sent.orig: I like to eat strawberry cakes.
Nose: Ripe, juicy strawberry and raspberry aromas with delicate vanilla spice undertones.
sent.trans: 气味：成熟草莓汁和覆盆子的香气混合着细致优雅的香草香料的味道。

sent.orig: And yellow the wet wild-strawberry leaves.
sent.trans: 还有那潮湿的叶也黄了，那野草莓。
